languages.text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} which were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: random, (from 1 to 3) rounds. ! Reloaded lances suffer an additional −25% hit chance penalty ! Can only be used during the end phase
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Перезаряжает{/g} все {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатели{/g}, стрелявшие в {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}фазу ускорения{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. ! После перезарядки лэнс-излучатели получают дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −25% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g} ! Может использоваться только в фазу конца движения

{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Перезаряжает{/g} все {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатели{/g}, стрелявшие в {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}фазу ускорения{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. ! languages.text: Lädt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzen{/g} nach, die während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} abgefeuert wurden. Abklingzeit: (1 bis 3) Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip. ! Nachgeladene Lanzen erhalten einen zusätzlichen Abzug auf die Trefferchance von −25 % ! Kann nur während der Endphase verwendet werden.
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} which were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: random, (from 1 to 3) rounds. ! Reloaded lances suffer an additional −25% hit chance penalty ! Can only be used during the end phase

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Lädt{/g} alle {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzen{/g} nach, die während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} abgefeuert wurden. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: zufällig, 1-3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}. ! Nachgeladene Lanzen erhalten einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} von −25% ! Kann nur während der Endphase verwendet werden.

languages.text: Recharge tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} mis à feu lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}. Temps de recharge : aléatoire, (de 1 à 3) rounds. ! Les lances rechargées subissent une pénalité supplémentaire de −25 % sur les chances de toucher ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la phase finale
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} which were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: random, (from 1 to 3) rounds. ! Reloaded lances suffer an additional −25% hit chance penalty ! Can only be used during the end phase

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recharge{/g} tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} mis à feu lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : aléatoire, 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. ! Les lances rechargées subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} supplémentaire de -25 % sur les {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la phase finale

languages.text: 立刻装填所有在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}发射过的{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛{/g}武器。 冷却时间：随机一到三轮。 ！重新装填的光矛武器，命中率会额外降低25%。 ！只能在结束阶段中使用。
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} which were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: random, (from 1 to 3) rounds. ! Reloaded lances suffer an additional −25% hit chance penalty ! Can only be used during the end phase

traits.locale_text: 立刻装填所有在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}发射过的{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛{/g}武器。 冷却时间：随机一到三轮。 ！重新装填的光矛武器，命中率会额外降低25%。 ！只能在结束阶段中使用。

languages.text: Recarga todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lanzas{/g} que se dispararan en la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}. Tiempo de recuperación: (de 1 a 3) asaltos aleatoriamente. ! Las lanzas recargadas sufren una penalización adicional del −25 % a la probabilidad de impacto. ! Solo se puede usar durante la fase final.
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} which were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: random, (from 1 to 3) rounds. ! Reloaded lances suffer an additional −25% hit chance penalty ! Can only be used during the end phase

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recarga{/g} todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lanzas{/g} que se dispararan en la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: aleatorio, 1-3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. ! Las lanzas recargadas sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} adicional del −25 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g}. ! Solo se puede usar durante la fase final.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}中に発射されたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}ランス{/g}をリロードする。 クールダウン：ランダムで1～3ラウンド。 ！リロードされたランスは、-25%の命中率ペナルティを受ける ！最終フェーズ中にのみ使用可能
languages.original_text: Reloads all {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} which were fired during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}. Cooldown: random, (from 1 to 3) rounds. ! Reloaded lances suffer an additional −25% hit chance penalty ! Can only be used during the end phase

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}中に発射されたすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}槍{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}：1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム） ！槍をリロードすると{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}がさらに25％減少の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 ！最終フェーズ中にのみ使用可能

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Hızlanma evresinde{/g} ateşlenmiş olan tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro topları{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}mızrakları{/g} doldurur. Dolum Süresi: Rastgele (1 ila 3) raunt. ! Doldurulan mızraklar, ilave −%25 vuruş olasılığı ceza puanına maruz kalır ! Yalnızca son evrede kullanılabilir
